review: The entire family loves the Amazon Fire TV Stick. Apps are available at your fingertips. We mostly watch Amazon and Netflix, but there is a wide variety of other apps available to use.The Fire TV Stick lets everyone watch their favorite shows on the TV. Before we had the stick everyone would only be able to use these apps on laptops and cell phones. Now we are getting more value out of our memberships by using the Fire TV Stick.
author: Amanda Murphy

review: Love Love Love. I'm too obsessed with this. And for $40?! Well worth it.

review: The first fire tv stick that I received overheated when I used it. However, I contacted customer service and they replaced it within two days. The new unit seems to be working just fine!
